name: Round Boys
description:
The Round Boys lost their nest, and they need a new one!

Take control of one of the Round Boys together with a friend and race and roll as different shapes to clear the course. 

This game requires a gamepad controller to play, where two players each take one joystick and a shoulder button to play.

This game is a prototype for a university project and has a few bugs.

(This game is a beta)
